transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello. Ha ji boliye. Ha bataiye.

Customer: Ji sir, good afternoon sir. Se free hai ji?

Executive: Ji ji. Sir main keh rahi thi ki agar aap online aa jate to main online aapko sari cheeze bata deti leads ki jo problem aa rahi hai.

Customer: Kya karna hai online? Hain?

Executive: Sir aapko leads ki problem aa rahi hai na to usi ke bare mein zyada kuch describe karna tha. Online matlab? Online online matlab?

Customer: Kaise aana hai matlab WhatsApp pe aana hai? Matlab main aapko main aapko link share kar de rahi hu aapke paas abhi kya available hai phone ya fir matlab laptop hai kis se join kar sakte hai aap video call?

Executive: Phone phone phone hai.

Customer: Phone se join kar sakte hai phone mein IndiaMART ki app hai aapki?

Executive: Haan haan.

Customer: Theek hai theek hai. To main phone pe jo hai main aapki mail ID pe link share kar deti hu usse aap join kar lijiye kyuki sir dekho aise aapko main bol dungi na verbally to clear nahi hoga is cheez hai. Theek hai. Main apni screen share karke aapko apni screen share karwa ke aapko sara kuch describe kar dungi. Aapki jo mail ID hai primary wali hai na aapke paas access hai uska?

Customer: Haan?

Customer: Primary mail ID ka access hai?

Customer: Primary mail ID aapki?

Executive: Jo mail ID hai aapki P se start hai sir.

Customer: Haan hai. Hai na? Okay. Theek hai. Ek minute zara.

Executive: Ek minute sir main link share kar rahi hu aapko.

Executive: Dekhiye sir maine aapko WhatsApp pe bhi link share kar diya aapki mail ID pe bhi kar diya aap ek baar check kar lijiye.

[inaudible]

[music]

You are speaking with has put your call.

[music]

[music]

Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahiye. The person you are speaking with has put your call.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is facing issues with leads.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to explain online via screen sharing.

- Executive shared link on WhatsApp and email.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, screen sharing, link
